MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: Authenticator auth = new SMTPAuthenticator(); Session mailSession = Session.getDefaultInstance(properties, auth);

messagePart.setContent( "Hello,

This is the body of the message. Visit http://www.contoso.com.

Thank you.", "text/html");
